item.description:
On June 3rd, five unique dining destinations in downtown Portsmouth will
compete for the ?Best Signature Cocktail of Portsmouth?

Downtown Portsmouth will transform itself into the ultimate place for a summer
Kickoff event! Event pass holders will enjoy food sampling and half price
on all signature cocktails from participating locations in downtown .To wind down
the night join us aboard the isles of shoals steamship authority and we cast the final
votes for the ?Best Signature Cocktail? and party like rock stars.


You can experience one of the hippest events to hit the Seacoast.
On Sunday, June 3rd from 5:00-8:00 pm. Participating locations include:

Blue Mermaid
Hilton Garden Inn
Library Restaurant
Molly Malone's
Dolphin Striker
Isles of Shoal Steamship Authority

Tickets are $15 /$25 day of event
purchase tickets today @ www.portsmouthcocktail.com!
item.name: Portsmouth Cocktail Competition June 3rd 5-8 pm
